name: Split - Merge and Divide
description:
You start the game as a simple form, a cube, that wants to return to home. On its path, it has to cross a labyrinth. To enter the maze, the cube has to divide into two pieces. Both pieces have to conquer different paths to find each other again at the ending. Every level presents different challenges and obstacles that stand in the way. A 3D skill and puzzle game.

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/split-merge-and-devide-0

Credits: 

Programming: Philipp Schauhuber

Art: David Hennerbichler, Tobias Friedinger

Level Design: Michael Leonhartsberger, Harald Mayrhofer

Sound Design: David Hennerbichler

Testing: everyone
